data.title: Europe, Middle East and Africa
data.meta_description: In Europe, the Middle East and Africa, BRG professionals work from our bases in the UK, Belgium, France, South Africa, the United Arab Emirates, Eastern Europe and Russia to serve clients across the region and beyond.
data.text:
BRG is a different kind of consulting firm: one that makes intelligence work by combining data analysis with extensive sector experience, creative perspectives with deep business acumen and big-picture thinking with executable direction to help you stay ahead of whatâ€™s next.

In Europe, the Middle East and Africa, our professionals work from our bases in the UK, Belgium, France, South Africa, the United Arab Emirates and Eastern Europe to serve clients across the region and beyond.

Collectively, our professionals have experience working across all industries in most locations in the world. We have also built focused teams dedicated to certain sectors where our track record and depth of understanding are world class.

Our expertise is focused around three core business lines: Corporate Finance; Economics, Disputes and Investigations, and Performance Improvement and Advisory. Team members from across these practices engage with each other every day, harnessing the exponential power of our collective knowledge.
